name: Yoink! (PumpkinBear111 Games)
description:
Yoink is a game where you try to steal as much stuff from the office as possible in a week before your boss gets too mad and fires you. At the end of each day you can buy a gift for your boss, such as a donut that makes him less mad, or an angry note that gives you a money multiplier, but makes the boss more angry. You are constantly on the edge of getting fired.

Warning: The web build is kinda scuffed and was rushed, so if you are willing to download the game, I would highly suggest downloading the windows build.

Yoink was made for the VimJam 2
